title: Cuccio Naturale Revitalizing- Hydrating Oil For Repaired Cuticles Overnight - Remedy For Damaged Skin And Thin Nails - Paraben /Cruelty-Free Formula - Milk And Honey - 2.5 Oz
description: Cuccio Naturale Cuticle Revitalizing Oils are designed to moisturize, nourish, and care for cuticles and nails. The formula is lightweight and melts into skin, replenishing dry, damaged skin and strengthening brittle, thin nails to prepare them for growth. Formulated with high quality natural cold pressed oils and vitamins, these aromatic oils will add a salon-quality level to your at-home manicure experience.
